thread.title: Lovely place with friendly, helpful staff
thread.title_full: Lovely place with friendly, helpful staff - Review of Hotel Sainte Beuve, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: P7575BPjonathanl
title: Lovely place with friendly, helpful staff
text: A travel agent friend of mine recommended this place and we are so thankful. We enjoyed the neighborhood and walked 25 miles in four days to view the incredible sites and museums of Paris. Amazing! The staff at the hotel were kind and helpful and we would especially like to thank Ivan, who taught us so well! We had some of the best meals of our lives at restaurants Invictus and Le Lisbonne. We hope to return someday and would stay there again.
